synonyms: nāraṅga-cholaṅga-āmra-vṛkṣera ākāra—sweetmeats in the shape of varieties of oranges, lemons and mangoes; phula-phala-patra-yukta—dressed with fruits, flowers and leaves; khaṇḍera vikāra—made from sugar candy.
translation: There were sweetmeats made from sugarcane candy in the form of oranges, lemons and mangoes along with fruits, flowers and leaves.
